availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Crittendon County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Letitia Wallace. Father of Mary H. Wallace, and Thomas Wallace. Farmer in Crittendon County in 1860. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittendon County, West half of county, p. 372.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Kentucky, Crittendon County, West half of county, p. 359.
